text: Margot Pompanon (born 12 April 1997) is a French professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for the UCI Women's Continental Team St. Michel–Auber93. Pompano rode and completed the 2022 Tour de France Femmes. She had a difficult first stage with two time a mechanical problems, but managed to finish in time. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:French cyclists Category:Sportswomen Category:People from Saône-et-Loire Category:Sportspeople from Bourgogne-Franche-Comté
title: Margot Pompanon
